newsitem.title: FINLAND: Raisio says new Benecol plant on stream.
newsitem.headline: Raisio says new Benecol plant on stream.

text.p: Finnish food, animal feed and chemicals group Raision Tehtaat Oy Ab said on Friday a new manufacturing plant for the active ingredient in its Benecol cholesterol-cutting margarine had come on stream as planned.

"It is estimated that the recently completed plant will produce enough of Benecol's active ingredient not only to satisfy Finnish demand but also to allow exporting to begin," Raisio said in a statement.
Raisio said plans had also been made for a second unit to produce the stanol ester ingredient.
"As announced earlier, both new units will be in use by January 1998," Raisio said, adding that its annual stanol ester capacity will then be 2,000 tonnes.
